Author: ca333#0118
Content:
AtomicDEX mobile 0.2.9 is available on playstore and testflight.

changelog:
```
Fixes:
update ZEC
update VRSC
```

please note: VRSC connectivity will be back in 12 - 24h. The Verus Team is upgrading SPV network.

Author: cipi#4502
Content: @bliss-coma minimum trade amount is 0.00777

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
> Why is $50 not a large enough amount to trade?
it is about the ratio `(transaction fees)/(trade amount)` 
we use dynamic transaction fees for bitcoin
if you had to pay a $2 transaction fee, the swap is most likely not worth it for many people

Content: Have you already updated to the latest patch?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: If you're on latest app version, have funds stuck in swap and it'll not "unstuck" in a few hours please DM me or @gcharang with mobile logs application attached and swap uuid

Author: figgy132#7531
Content: I haven't updated to latest patch yet - do that then wait? Then send logs & uuid after some time?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Yes, please update first (but use update button, do not uninstall app or swap data will be wiped). Then try to wait and/or use funds unlock button

Author: figgy132#7531
Content: @TonyL updated, added the coins, went to the failed swap, hit unlock, worked immediately - received the ZEC :) atomicdex is pretty awesome!

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Perfect, so as soon as your AtomicDEX got updated ZEC params it performed unlock transaction. Glad that it worked!
